title: 请问有没有这个幸运方块地图的整合包
author: xxpian
txt_content:
是这样的，我是想找个好玩的幸运方块的地图和朋友一起玩，忽然想起一个以前看过的视频里的地图，那个地图我记得有几个视频主或者up主做过视频，好像总共有十一关，那个地图看着很好玩，记得以前就想玩了，但玩不了，现在正好玩玩这个地图，地图应该算挺大的，我在curseforge上找到了这个地图，但是貌似因为网络问题我下载不了这张地图，而这个地图貌似下载时只有地图，我也无法找到这张地图里的幸运方块的各种附属和一些mod，整合包找了好久也找不到，站内也没有，希望有人有这个整合包能帮帮我

地图是这个样（其他图片暂时找不到，如果没法认不来，我再找找其他游戏的截图）

replies.author: 自省之人
replies.txt_content: 那个地图简介里有需要什么mod

replies.author: 自省之人
replies.txt_content:
Install forge for minecraft 1.8.9. The recommended version is usually best.
Install the Lucky Block mod, version 7.0.2 or higher.
Install Loot++, version 1.7.1 or higher.
Install Potion Core, version 1.2 or higher.
Spiral Lucky Block - Version 1.10
Astral Lucky Block - Version 1.2
Pink Lucky Block - 1 Year Anniversary Edition
Rainbow Lucky Block - Version 1.8.1
Night Lucky Block - Version 2.5
Delta Lucky Block - No version number... apparently
Emerald Lucky Block - Version 1.9（来自curseforge）

replies.author: 浅海星未眠
replies.txt_content:
First get all the mods set up:



Install forge for minecraft 1.8.9. The recommended version is usually best.
Install the Lucky Block mod, version 7.0.2 or higher.
Install Loot++, version 1.7.1 or higher.
Install Potion Core, version 1.2 or higher.
At this point, it's a good idea to run the game to make sure everything is working. Then install the addons:

Also note it's VERY important to get the right version numbers for the addons, since many of the kits rely on items from them! If you see items obviously missing from kits, check your version numbers again!



Spiral Lucky Block - Version 1.10
Astral Lucky Block - Version 1.2
Pink Lucky Block - 1 Year Anniversary Edition
Rainbow Lucky Block - Version 1.8.1
Night Lucky Block - Version 2.5
Delta Lucky Block - No version number... apparently
Emerald Lucky Block - Version 1.9
Now you're almost good. One last thing is that the emerald lucky block creates insane amounts of lag if there are a lot of mobs around, because runs a command from every single mob in the game every single game tick, but I found a fix for it:



Go into the zipped download with a program like 7-zip or Winzip (or unzip it first if you want).
Find the file config/item_effects/command_held.txt, and delete it.
Don't worry, it won't affect gameplay at all, it's an entirely unnecessary command!
Now you should be good to go!

安装1.8.9forge
安装
http://mods.curse.com/customizat ... 8-lucky-block-addon
http://mods.curse.com/customizat ... astral-lucky-blocks
http://mods.curse.com/customizat ... ucky-block-pink-3-0
Rainbow Lucky Block
http://mods.curse.com/customizat ... lock-1-8-and-1-7-10
http://mods.curse.com/customizat ... lock-1-8-and-1-7-10
http://mods.curse.com/customizat ... 1-9-new-lucky-items
Delta Lucky Block
安装地图
开始游戏
